title: Add Contact page route and phone numbers in header/footer

requirements.summary: Add a new public /contact route with clearly displayed click-to-call phone numbers.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting "/contact" shows both phone numbers exactly as provided: 8754585354 and 9677219328
Each number is a clickable tel: link that opens the device dialer on supported devices
All user-facing text on the Contact page is in English

file_operations.description: Create a new public ContactPage that renders the tuition centre phone numbers "8754585354" and "9677219328" prominently, each as a tel: link, with English-only headings/labels.
Register the new "/contact" route in the TanStack Router route tree and render the new ContactPage within the existing Layout (Header/Footer).

requirements.summary: Update header navigation so the Contact item navigates to /contact on desktop and mobile menus.
acceptanceCriteria: The header includes a working navigation path to the Contact page at "/contact"
Navigation works on both desktop and mobile header menus

file_operations.description: Update the existing header nav so the "Contact" item navigates to the "/contact" route (instead of scrolling to the "enquiry" section), and ensure the same behavior is applied for both desktop navigation and the mobile menu.

requirements.summary: Display the contact phone numbers in the footer 'Connect With Us' area site-wide with click-to-call links.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays both numbers exactly as provided
Footer layout remains visually consistent with existing styling

file_operations.description: Add the phone numbers "8754585354" and "9677219328" to the footer "Connect With Us" section as tel: links while keeping the existing footer styling and layout consistent.
